Name: Geolosys
About the game: Geolosys is 2048 game in which you have to earn new gems by earning points. Embark on exciting excavations and find all the secrets buried in the lands of Geolosys! Game Features: Beautiful pixel art, Library of stones, Ability to play with swipes, Nice music.
